description: This file sets up an asynchronous agent using the OpenRouter model, and runs a streaming response for a horror story prompt.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the OpenRouter model, capable of running prompts and streaming responses.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes a prompt with the agent, optionally streaming the response.

methods.name: agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the response to the terminal.
